name: IP2Innovate
goal:
IP2Innovate’s mission is to bring balance to Europe’s patent legal system so that it supports innovation and economic growth for the benefit of all. Strong IP protection must be a pillar of the digital-based economy, but such protections must be balanced to take into account the legitimate interests and rights of patent holders to be fairly rewarded and the public’s interest in fuelling investment in new technologies.

As part of that mission, we raise awareness about the imbalances in Europe’s patent legal system and how they are exploited to the detriment of Europe’s innovators, as shown by the rise of Patent Assertion Entities’ (PAEs) in Europe. We work with policymakers, the legal profession and judicial authorities to address these imbalances in order to protect the integrity of the patent legal system in Europe and support its goal of innovation.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
IP package
UPC agreement
Digital Single Market
Single Market
Internet of Things (IoT)
Artificial Intelligence
